name: FatDUX
overview:
FatDUX is a full-service interactive agency. They create and facilitate effective and enjoyable interactions between people, processes, and machines.

FatDUX is specialized in following verticals:

  • healthcare
  • industrial processes
  • telecommunications
  • government/NGO
  • international tourism
  • IT / ICT

In addition to B2B and service-design expertise, they work extensively with fast-moving consumer goods and personal electronics.

They make sure FatDUX clients create a positive impression at key brand touchpoints, through the use of innovative interactive products. FatDUX develops detailed blueprints to guide designers, programmers, and content providers. They design and incorporate visual identity to ensure consistency and recognition. And they conduct impartial usability evaluations to improve the value of their work.

The Name The DUX in their name is a popular acronym for “Design of User eXperience”. It’s a term used to describe the overall experience and satisfaction a user has when using a product or system. Good UX makes people happy and makes businesses more successful. But if UX is ignored, the results can be very bad indeed.

The team Combined, the members of the FatDUX team have almost two centuries of interactive experience - including the development of over 1000 websites and other on-line applications.

Clients Clients include Zappos, eBay, Amazon, DONG Energy, TÃœV, and the UN.

The FatDUX Group has affiliates and associates throughout Europe and North America, plus strategic partners in Africa, the Middle East, and the Asia-Pacific region.
